programme.title: She Sees
programme.desc: A blind woman grapples with the psychological trauma of being abused by a Dr meant to care for her but a chance meeting brings them together again but this time she see him for his crimes.

programme.title: My Chances
programme.desc: The loving marriage of Bryan and Jemima starts to show cracks when Bryan loses his job and they seek help from their landlord, Donald. Donald takes a liking to Jemima and offers her a job leading Bryan to begin to feel neglected.

programme.title: AMC Red Carpet - Arivla Asoebi Party & Fashion Show
programme.desc: AMC Red Carpet moments which brings you exclusive red carpet interviews with Nollywood stars at the premieres of top Nollywood movies and other industry events such as award ceremonies.

programme.title: Vicious Circle
programme.desc: A married philanderer begins to have an affair with a married woman, causing both their homes to drastically fall part and fatality.

programme.title: Too Late
programme.desc: A man constantly cheats on his girlfriend with no remorse, believing she will always forgive him and take him back, until one day he takes things too far and she decides to move on. He does all he can to get her back but is it too late?

programme.title: Just One Call Away
programme.desc: A staunch believer returns from a 15-day business trip and exhibits symptoms of COVID-19. His pregnant wife, Kemi suspects he may have been exposed to the virus and insists they call NCDC to get him tested. However he fears he will be taken away and never get to see his family again.

programme.title: Humble Pie
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. A down-on-their luck couple turn to a life of crime, calling themselves Bonnie and Clyde, when the man loses his job due to unfortunate circumstances. Their crimes lead the to a bickering couple, Eric and Zara, and the chance meeting has everyone re-evaluating their actions.

programme.title: Moving On
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. A handsome oil magnet and overly faithful husband finds his classy and sassy wife in bed with another man in their home. Upon threatening to divorce her, she stages an accident with the help of her best friend, a medical doctor, and fakes amnesia.

programme.title: AMC Red Carpet - The Artifact
programme.desc: AMC Red Carpet brings you exclusive red carpet interviews with Nollywood stars at the premieres of top Nollywood movies and other industry events such as award ceremonies.

programme.title: Wild Wild Bayo
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Adeline gets the shock of her life when she is dumped by Kunle without reason. She soon finds out that he has been cheating on her with two other and is getting married to the daughter of a billionaire. She decides to team up with the other women a few days before his wedding to teach him a lesson.

programme.title: The Other Side
programme.desc: Mrs Phillip tries to hide her illicit business from her husband, but brings trouble to her doorstep when she unknowingly hires Gina, the niece of her "business associate".

programme.title: Tales of Vanessa
programme.desc: Vanessa constantly manipulates her boyfriend, Deji, who has been thoroughly spoiled by his mother, into giving her money. But soon the money Deji is getting from his mother is not enough for her, so she schemes to get it directly from the sources.

programme.title: Enemy Closer
programme.desc: The relationship between Muna and Owen falls apart when Muna discovers that Owen is having an affair. The betrayal cuts her so deep, she decides to take drastic action leading to fatal consequences.

programme.title: AMC Red Carpet - My Mother Is A Witch
programme.desc: AMC Red Carpet moments which brings you exclusive red carpet interviews with Nollywood stars at the premieres of top Nollywood movies and other industry events such as award ceremonies.

programme.title: Samantha
programme.desc: An extranged couple decide to get together, along with their new partners, to discuss custody and well-being of the estranged couple's daughter, samantha. Things start to go awry as old wounds are reopened and old feelings, good and bad start to resurface.

programme.title: The Three Brides
programme.desc: Kayode loves women as much as he loves to lie about how much money he has. Now, he has become the most eligible bachelor in town and women want to keep him by all means. Unaware of kayode’s true pocket status, the women fight over maintaining their position in kayode’s life. Empowered by their charms, the women get kayode to fall in love with all three of them at the same time. But is kayode the man these women truly want to be with?

programme.title: Unforgotten
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. On the third anniversary of her husband’s death, a widow receives a strange visitor who reveals some hidden secrets surrounding her late husband and demands something from her which her husband owed – something she is willing to lay down her life for.

programme.title: Lockdown
programme.desc: When the federal government imposes a lockdown to control a global pandemic, corona virus plaguing the world, two couples, who have been married for years and thought they knew each other, find that spending so much time together in the confined space of their home may not be a good thing. Hidden secrets will be uncovered, and weaknesses will be known. How will they cope and whose secret is worse?
